definitions.text: the spatial property resulting from the arrangement of parts in relation to each other and to the whole
examples: harmonious composition is essential in a serious work of art

definitions.text: the way in which someone or something is composed
a musical work that has been created
examples: the composition is written in four movements

definitions.text: the act of creating written works
examples: writing was a form of therapy for him
it was a matter of disputed authorship

definitions.text: art and technique of printing with movable type
an essay (especially one written as an assignment)
examples: he got an A on his composition

definitions.text: something that is created by arranging several things to form a unified whole
examples: he envied the composition of their faculty
